amendment.description: To provide for a significant environmental review process associated with the development of Indian energy projects and to establish duties of the federal government to Indian tribes in implementing an energy development program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 881 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 219.

Amendment SA 881 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S7684-7689) To provide for a significant environmental review process associated with the development of Indian energy projects and to establish duties of the federal government to Indian tribes in implementing an energy development program, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 881 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 219.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 881 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
